question: Which festival is also called Dhanwantri Jayanthi?
explanation:
The festival of Dhanteras is also known as Dhan Trayodashi and Dhanwantri Jayanti. This year, it is celebrated in 13th November, the day before Diwali and marks the first day of the Diwali celebration.
It is celebrated on the thirteenth lunar day in the Hindu calendar month of Ashwin. Dhanwantri, who is considered the God of Ayurveda, is worshipped on this day.
